website_summaries.verdict: The Oppo UDP-203 is an excellent high-end 4K Blu-ray disc player, but image quality improvements over cheaper players are tough to spot.
pros: The Oppo UDP-203 is a well-built, premium 4K Blu-ray player and the first to support Dolby Vision disc playback
Connectivity is superb, with a full 7.1 analog output and even an HDMI input for connecting streaming players
Video and audio quality is excellent
cons: The player is expensive and defiantly free of built-in streaming features
Picture performance isn't readily distinguishable from players at half the price

I pinged customer service and they replied promptly, although the reply was less than ideal: basically, use DLNA, not NFS - but then why advertise it? In any case, that's a minor nit AFAIAC. customer_reviews.title: this player is not as good as the first
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed with the older model I have had for years. When it was time to modernize, I decide to buy another Oppo. Unfortunately, this player is not as good as the first. If I pause a show, the audio and video go out of sync. If I change my selection, the screen starts to flicker nonstop. I have to turn the machine off and on again to correct the issue. I wish I could give this device a higher rating, but it is a dud. Maybe the problem is because it has been modified by the third party I bought it from.

product_meta.title: Headphone Adapter to 3.5mm Audio Jack for iPhone8
product_meta.description: The New Standard in Home Theater - The OPPO UDP-203 provides an unmatched A/V experience to home theater enthusiasts. Drawing from over a decade's worth of experience in advanced image processing technology and high fidelity audio performance, the UDP-203 Ultra HD Blu-ray player is the ideal source to complete the ultimate home theater and sound room.
feature_bullets: [Apple Certified]: lightning to 3.5mm headphone jack adapter certified by Apple MFi (PPID: 219693-0144). The simple unit to connect existing earphones, headphones or car aux with 3.5mm jack to a new iPhone 11 / X / XR / XS / XS Max / 8 / 7, etc. A necessary iPhone headphone adapter for a new iPhone that does not have a 3.5mm jack.

[Universal Compatible]: This 3.5mm lightning headphone adapter works with all devices that have a lightning plug with IOS 10.3.1 or later such as iPhone 11 / 11 Pro / 11 Pro Max / XS Max / XS / XR / X / 8 / 8 Plus / 7 / 7 Plus, iPad / iPad Mini / iPad Air / iPad Pro (Lightning Connector). A perfect little handy accessory to carry around for your latest iOS devices.

[Multi-Functions]: headphone adapter not only support listening to music but also the wire control function such as a microphone, volume control, pause and play functions, plug and play with no setting changes. ( NOTE: It doesn't support OMTP Android headphones and the volume control function for CTIA Android headphones.)

[Superior Sound]: This iPhone headphone adapter also supports Apple lossless audio, sampling rate up to 48KHz and filter out noise to give you a nice clear sound. Built-in enameled copper and PVC jacket could ensure stable sound transmission. Compact and stylish design in pure white color, lightweight and perfectly match with your original apple earphone.

[Quality Assurance]: Tech provides lifetime customer support, simply feel free to contact us if you have any problem with this lightning to 3.5mm headphone jack adapter. (NOTE: It doesn't compatible with 2018 iPad Pro 11" / 12.9" which has a USB C interface)
